content.detailedDescription: Me and family were at a drive in movie theater when we noticed a golden pulsating light in the sky. i first noticed it and told my fiance who said it was a plane and then i stopped looking and turned away she then said "babe look its gone." the object had dissapeared, vanished were her exact words, it seems very very large as it was about the height of a commercial aircraft but much larger and a diff shape. the object was a bright orb like light that was golden in color and shined very bright at night while it pulsated slowly.
content.summary: Seen a golden-ish glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: Hello my name is patrick.I was abducted when i was 7 years old.They, what you call greys today took me to their ship.I was clearly awake when they came i was awake when i was on their ship and clearly awake when they brought me back.They remove me from my bed in the middle of the night.The way i felt at the time was numb and on controlling.One of them put out it's hand and led me down the hall.The next thing you know i'm inside a metallic craft. they even had toys in there and the toys were also metallic, the same color throughout the ship. i was literally waiting in a room with one of them.The door opened up and i was led into another room.At that point i started to get nervous and panic then all went blank and the next thing you know i was back walking down the hall to my bedroom.I am 47 years old today and i remember it as if it happened yesterday. i have had sightings since then clearly.I honestly feel as if they check on me or follow me from time to time.Although both sightings since then have been quite different.One of the sightings of a ship was like a cigar.It was three to five hundred feet long where the light glow of red around the exterior.It passed overhead and split into three different sections and went in a totally different direction.The other incident was off of i4 coming back from orlando one night around 10 o'clock at night.There were three orbs in the sky moving as if they were playing with one of the other changing places, following me.I stopped and got off of my motorcycle took off my helmet wondering if it was a glare from my windscreen but turned out they were three different ufo's.At that point when i was stopped they stopped as well.Hovered in the sky for about 4 or 5 minutes and then took off faster than i've seen anything move before.Just like that they were gone......Now with the information i have provided you, i would be more than happy to get into more detail.I also want you to know everything i have told you is true.I understand with all the tv shows on ufos today people will play games and waste your time.I assure you these events took place and happened to me.
content.summary: 1st encounter i was abducted when i was 7. clearly seen 2 ufo's since then

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was heading home on a beautiful clear night. the moon was low so the night sky was still black with tons of bright stars out. suddenly...I noticed off to my front left what looked like a fireball traveling thru the sky. i didnt feel scared or in danger. i just couldn't figure out what i was looking at. it seemed to be traveling east about the same height that a helicopter would fly or slightly higher. i didn't hear any noise. and oddly...It didn't light up the sky around it.  i pulled over to video. it was hard to film. in the video you can see the burst with color...Then change to more white star like.  as i adjusted to get a fixed point in the film (the moon) the object changed its direction to a more east path...And then i lost sight of it. i never turned down my radio...But you can hear the spring peepers (frogs) in the video. if that object made any noise..I didn't hear it. sorry for the f bomb at the end..But i didn't want to edit it out and make the video appear altered.
content.summary: Clear night with low moon. saw a fireball traveling not extremely fast and not slow like drifting. pulled over to video. it changed to star like appearance and slight direction change

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch at about 9:00 pm enjoying the warmth of the day when i noticed two lights drifting upwards from a treeline maybe about  500 ft away. they were fairly bright and i thought they were those memorial candle thingys people light up and let them float away. i was thinking if they come down they could start a fire. i watched them float upwards at about a 15 degree angle to the left and felt that they were getting too high to be those candles. they then seemed to stop rising and stayed stationary for several seconds. the light on the left moved higher and eventually disappeared into the clouds while the one the right slowly "drifted" further to the left and then started moving to the right. i continued to watch it as it just kept moving further away (to the right) and it also eventually disappeared into the clouds. 

during this sighting i was wondering if maybe they were some sort of aircraft except that other than for a couple cars passing my house it really was a nice quiet evening. i heard no sounds that one could expect to hear from aircraft.

at the point that the object had stopped rising i realized i should have been trying to get some video which was when i finally grabbed my cell phone and started recording.

my camera recorded it sideways unfortunately so not sure how it will end up looking if it gets displayed on this website.
content.summary: First a glowing cone/cup like shape

content.detailedDescription: On may 3, 2015 a friend an i were out on my porch. we noticed how pretty the moon looked so i went to get my camera. i turned my flash off & began to take photos. they have an explainable object in the photos that appears to move around. we could not see this with our naked eye.
content.summary: Moon photos with strange object appeared

content.detailedDescription: We were at my girlfriends grandparents house and i was waiting in the car. as i do lots of times i was looking up into the sky for planes and helicopters to observe. then in front of me i saw the sphere coming towards my location. i got out of the car so i wouldn't lose it as it flew overhead. at first from a distance i thought it might be a helicopter but it had no tail or rotors and didn't make any noise, at all. when my girlfriend came outside i gave her my sunglasses so she could see it, which she did. from the time it took her to hand me back the glasses it had vanished. it also glinted periodically in the sun.
content.summary: Small sphere shaped craft, with light or something glinting periodically.

content.detailedDescription: I began experiencing abductions at around age 16. it was a paralysis.I knew something was taking me but it would blank out my memory of what was happening.As i got older and moved to various places it would still happen but i began battling it calling on the name of jesus and the abductions would end abruptly. the last one i had was the worst. i was actually allowed to see the aliens as they entered my bedroom and took me. they began drilling into my side and it was excruciatingly painful. i began calling on the name of jesus and it did not seem to help...Like they did not speak the same language so i began thinking of alternate names for god that i knew and when i said elohim they immediately released me and i was back in my bedroom.I was crying and very shook-en up and this awoke my girlfriend. she thought i had a nightmare and did not believe me that i had been abducted. i was so scared that i sat straight up and tried not to go back to sleep but began dozing out. i was awakened a while later by my girlfriend screaming hysterically that the same thing had happened to her. she was so shaken by it that she immediately began checking doors and windows to make sure they were locked and then pushed the night stand up against the bedroom door. i began praying very hard and as i started dozing off i noticed a sparkling of the door like an entity was there but nothing came thru the door. i believe it was an angel sent to protect us from what was trying to come thru the door again after us.A few months ago i experienced a grey enter my home during the day and i began praying heavily. it could only come as far as the hall but could not enter the room i was in and after a battle with it through prayer it finally left my home.I have seen numerous ufos and been followed by them at night while driving or walking.
content.summary: I have had abduction experiences since i was sixteen years old. my mother and brother as well. the last one i had was almost two years ago and i actually saw and remembered the abductors that time as well as the pain they inflicted.

content.detailedDescription: I have noticed for several months now a very bright, pulsating and color changing object in the sky, bigger and brighter than a star that moves in all different directions and disappears and reappears. it is visible every night.
content.summary: For several months now have observed a pulsating, color changing object in the night sky that moves in different directions, appears and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a school song event and as i came out, around 10 ish. i looked into the sky and saw a flash of light in the skiy. it grew bigger and bigger and exploded. a glowwy orange mist appeared behind it. like a flash. sorry its not detailed im in school :)
it just dropped out of sight in a flash.
it made a loud echoey noise like a roar but echoed.
content.summary: Dropped out of the sky, ascended and then fell. changed shape and exploded to a big glow and then an orange mist appeared after it.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the vatican taking photos and later that day when looking through them i noticed a bright white dot in the sky.

the photo was taken with my samsung galaxy s5 and when zoomed in 2 more white objects became visible but appeared much smaller/more distant. the main object looks like a solid white ball with a cloud around it with a couple small black dots.
content.summary: Saw object in background of photo

content.detailedDescription: My mother, sleeping 3 year old daughter, and i were driving back home from the park. i always look at the sky, as i'm in love with stars. at first i thought i saw 5 airplanes in the sky. but i realized off to the left and right there were in fact 2 planes, but the 5 things i was seeing were not planes. they were continuously lit up red, did not have any flashing lights or anything. at first we thought they were chinese lanterns, because of how slowly they were moving. but they were going towards the right (southeast), not up, and we saw two or three move up and down. i had my mom pull over so i could try to take pictures. i've seen videos of them before but never saw them in person. the way i felt was very bizarre. i feel as though i was meant to see it. i felt drawn to them. i lost sight of the objects when they suddenly faded out, like their lights went off or something. the day after that night, i zoomed in on the pictures of the lights i was able to catch, and realized there were multiple small orbs making up what appeared to be larger ones to the naked eye. the pictures aren't the best quality, but they can still be seen.
content.summary: Floating red lights, looked like 5 but when zoomed in, can see each is made up of smaller orbs.

content.detailedDescription: When me and my dad was going home before we got into las vegas we spotted to our left side of car a ufo, i watched it, until it started to move away from us, then my dad turned right then that is where i lost sight of it. it was a good 15 -20 mintues that i was watching it.
content.summary: When me and my dad was going home before we got to las vegas we spoted to our left side, i watched it tell it started to moved then my dad turned right then that is where i lost sightof it

content.detailedDescription: This was related to me by a friend who wants to remain annonymous.  as a young man my friend was taken by two friends across country in a vw over some hills at [location removed]  stopping at a hill they got out and the two friends laughed and said to my friend look  he did and said the did not see anything.  they said look again and he still did not see anything.  they said look again  then he saw what looked like naked people moving large boxes or crates.  the people looked naked and had very large ears.  my friend realized they were not humans.  as they looked the naked people stopped working and they all stared at my friend and the two with him.  the driver of the vw said they had to leave fast so they got in the car and drove away as fast as conditions allowed.  the father of the driver was at the time a physics researcher and the driver went on to become big in computers  my friend feels that the naked people were aliens and that there is an under ground facility now in [location removed] truthfully i have not understood why the greys have not taken over already.  perhaps the naked people seen are the results of the greys breeding experiments with humans   by the way you are i assume aware that the greys are breeding pure greys here on earth   thought some one might be interested in the location of an alien facility and be interested in a new species of critter
content.summary: Observed space aliens at a distance moving large boxes on the ground

content.detailedDescription: Dog started barking i live in the country.  was walking by picture window saw white light pulsing hovering over field to west. watched for few seconds before going outside. no sound but felt a vibration like a loud car stereo sub constant. tried to start truck to get closer and wouldn't start. went back in and shot on phone what i could off front porch.
content.summary: Saw hovering light after dog barking truck wouldnt start recorded last 30 sec

content.detailedDescription:
In backyard watching b-17 and b-25 flying low around neighborhood, live near john wayne airport (sna). binoculars are 15x70, 4.4fov. clear day, few contrails, couple small clouds, maybe only 3 percent in sky. caught star sized blinking light (slight white-orange). probably around 5:40pm. would watch it, neck get tried, stop, then anywhere from 2 minutes to 5 minutes would look back and find it. 
at 6:10pm, looked up and it (or maybe a different one?) was blue! bright metallic blue, medium tone, not a dark blue. watched that as long as i could (3 to 5 minutes?)was moving west towards south slow. came into the house. several minutes later went back outside to spot it again and it had a pink-ish slight red, but mostly white. in the meantime it was (if the same one) always throbbing from real dim to very bright un-rhythmically. 

as i was lowering and raising the binoculars (neck strain), i then saw another dim light appear near the one i was watching (in the fov- field of view) then was brighter then started blinking. then another. then i was moving my binoculars around slightly to see another, 4 total. they were all moving west and west south except the original one which stopped blinking, was steady-ish light (one of the new ones, somewhat slowly, flew "through" the original one. i first thought they were going to merge, did not). lost track of the other three.
the original one eventually started to blink again. moved slowly to the west almost directly overhead. flew past venus (which in the day looked like a round small disk), then was heading back the opposite way towards the east. then i lost sight.
note: at one time i saw a balloon with the string drifting faster and high (it was a lot bigger that the lights moving south), i could easily see the shape of the balloon. another time near the end of my viewing, something came moving past my fov that was close, moving east. had no string, was bright orange, shape seemed to have lots of triangles and was "rolling" took up about 1/2 my view. thought it was maybe a balloon, but didn't want to take my sight off the multiple blinking lights at that time.
the winds usually move west towards the north here in santa ana next to the south coast plaza (border costa mesa), orange county, california.

about two years ago, saw one with naked eye that was reddish white on a late friday sun still up. saturday i forgot to look again to see if they were there but sunday went out to the backyard late in the day about the same time and wallah! about ten minutes later we saw three more appear and hover, some slightly drifting,(didn't have my binoculars then) they were pulsing red/orange. after about twenty minutes, they started to move in different directions. one south, one west (almost over our heads) and the other two went north. after they started to move, they started to twinkle very brightly as they were moving faster and vanish (i only saw two vanish but they others also were gone).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching flybys of ww2 bombers. saw blinking, throbing light for awhile, then later 3 more appeared.   came back at one time and was bright med metallic blue?

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my parents’ house in desert hot springs, ca for a mother’s day dinner on sunday may 10, 2015. at approximately 6:40pm pst my family i had just finished eating dinner while sitting outside on the patio. we were noticing some small birds gathering near my parent’s birdfeeder when we then saw 4-5 large egrets fly over the house. this in and of itself is rather odd, as that is not a bird we typical see in the area of the coachella valley.

i turned towards where the egrets were coming from and noticed a silver sphere/orb rise above the roof line of the neighboring house. i would estimate this object to be within a mile of our location and no more than 1,000 off the ground. it appeared to be a perfect metallic sphere, with no visible wings, engine, windows, landing gear, etc. the object was also completely silent and no other visible planes were in the area at that time. my mother and i saw the object for about 10-15 seconds before it disappeared behind a small gathering of clouds. 

we were about 10 miles away from palm springs international airport and regularly see planes flying above and near the house. i am also a member of the palm springs air museum and consider myself an amateur airplane photographer and have the ability and knowledge to identify many types of aircraft. this was nothing like i have ever seen. i have previous experiences of seeing lights in the sky i couldn't fully explain or didn't seem to be airplane lights but this was a completely different experience. this was an object unlike anything i have seen in the air.
content.summary: Silver/metallic orb viewed in sky

content.detailedDescription: We have a game camera for our wildlife viewing. while going through several pictures we noticed an item that was out of place compared to the others. we do have wildlife (deer, elk, sand hill crane, blue heron, mallard & teal ducks along with an array of birds) but to me it doesn't look like them.  we have 2 pictures roughly 45 minutes apart. the item is in the red boxed area of one.I have paint shop pro and have zoomed in but no joy.There are no metal items in the questioned area. note the black item in the center. it's gone in the 2nd picture as well. we're located in a canyon of colorado, fairly isolated.I know your group is busy & i do believe, but if you could better id this i'd appreciate it.
content.summary: Possible drone by shape but only 1 picture

content.detailedDescription:
My mother, a friend and myself were sitting on the front porch enjoying the evening. at approximately 22:40 we noticed a pulsating orange and yellow sphere traveling what we believe to be se to ne. at first we thought it was a plane with its collision lights on but as it got closer i knew that the light was not white but orange. there were no blinking red and green lights and the light did not diminish in intensity until after it had traveled several miles past our location. there were no apparent sounds from a jet engine or props, just quiet, even though it appeared to be less than a mile away.

we thought it may have been a military chopper but it would have had to been flying extremely quiet. then we noticed a second light on the se horizon heading our direction. we were discussing whether the object had circled when we noticed several more appearing from the same direction. i then went in to the house to grab my cell phone to take some photos and get my wife to come out to look at what we were seeing. within the next 20 minutes we observed approximately 36 of these lights all the about the same size, with the same color characteristics, flying the same direction from the same area as the others appeared, with no noise and eventually going dark at about 3 to 5 miles from our location.

their speed was slow almost to the point of what i would call floating but definitely moving faster than a balloon but slower than a helicopter. at several times we had 6 to 8 objects in clear view and several times it appeared as though they were flying in v shaped formations. there was one instance when it looked as though 2 objects were going to collide and at the last second they both changed direction to avoid collision. the objects did not have any distinct markings or defined edges. as they pulsated they appeared as almost opaque.

at first we thought possibly the military was doing maneuvers since it was friday night but then we became more skeptical as to what these lights were. i talked with a neighbor about ten minutes later and he felt it may have been the military flying drones. none of us who witnessed this event quite know what we saw and were in total dismay because we could not come up with a definitive answer as to what the objects were or why they were in the area.

i have photos on my cell phone but to the naked eye they appear as small dots in the dark sky and i was unable to see as much as i did with the naked eye so they were no help. however if you want to see them i will supply them upon request. i have been looking to see if anyone else had the occurrence for the same area and time.
content.summary: Observed approximately 3 dozen pulsating orange and yellow lights between 22:40 thru 23 :10 traveling over mercersburg pa

content.detailedDescription: I had just bought a fuji ax655 and was shooting some pictures playing with it and having coffee at dunn bros.. several nights later i was looking through my pictures and found this, having no idea i had caught it, after looking close at the object it appears to have 8 lights around the outside edge and a cluster of 3 or 4 in the middle
content.summary: Found captured in a photo i took

content.detailedDescription: Several people observed two orbs that resembled stars high in the sky. the obs were apart at the beginning and then started to move closer together. the orbs started to separate and moved apart. one of the orbs moved to the west, then the other orb moved to the east until high clouds moved in the area and suddenly the orbs were gone.
content.summary: Several people observed two orbs high in the sky moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my vehicle and looked over to talk to my fiance, then i noticed and looked up at three bright lights that just shot downward in the sky. it looked like it could have crashed but i could not tell. about five min later and very nice white and black car with very dark tinted windows drove through the small town i live in which is very unlikely, then following the nice car was a very nice jeep with dark tinted window also and some bright lights on the front of the vehicle. they both were headed in the direction i seen the lights fall.
content.summary: I looked towards the sky and three bright lights just shot downward in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On may 10 , 2015 at 2 am in the morning an oscillating sound was heard outside of my house windows. it started out like a normal electrical motor sound. at first i thought it was someone return for the work at working the night shift but the noise got louder and soon i recognized the sound again of u.F.O. i felt the heavy pull of electrical magnetic force hit me in my bed. i was scared and did not leaved the house. i look out the window and saw the a light shining on the truck. this lasted for an hour about and hour and strange knocking on wood scared me and final took action to wake up the family . i show the light outside to my mom. the animal in the house didn't reacted to the noise but my aunt dogs work is staying with us. her dogs did reacted strange noise at 3 am. a about 3.45 to 3.50 am the beam of light left and the sound.
content.summary: Beam of light

content.detailedDescription:
I backed my vehicle from my residence onto the county road and there it was right in front of me.
i stopped the vehicle and closed my eyes.
i said to myself its just the clouds.
i opened my eyes and it was still there.
a huge black rectangular object jutting out of a low cloud.
it didn't move or do anything, it was just there.
i stared at this object for maybe 20 seconds till the clouds covered it.

it appeared to have a smooth finish. no lights. no magic tricks.
it was as tall as it was deep. length unknown.
the impression that i got was that it could have been as large as an aircraft carrier.
i did not get a photo.
content.summary: Very large black rectangular craft seen sticking out of a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: June 8th at 10:48 in  south nanaimo i took the dogs for a walk and 5 minutes in i looked up my street and i saw an solid orb of light apearing semi-transparent coming towards my direction and within 10 to 15 seconds few directly over top of me approx 500 ft to 1000ft high. i managed to get a small video of it flying in the distance, i thought it was really weird since i did not hear any noise or see chem trails behind it. it seemed to be the size of an suv or small camper.
content.summary: Took dogs for a walk and noticed a orb of light  approx 500 to 1000 feet from ground , craft flew directly over top of me

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking when i notices a brite white light in the sky and a blinking light to the left of it that was stationary  watched them both 4 about 45mins then went in and asked my mom come outside and 2 grab binoculers the one brite white light changed shape 3 times y w were watching it then the blinking 1 has multicolored blue green red white orange lights that revolve around it then looking around it found 4 more multicolored either smaller or farther away planes and jets helicopters  flying by look like grains of sand compared 2 these awsome things i always knew we were not alone
content.summary: Not planes jets helicopters airliners 2 colorful and stationary we not alone i've always known

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and 3 friends were camping at south mountain state park at the sawtooth campsite.  its an opened cleared site with a nice view of the sky.  approx 10:30 may 9th 2015, i was looking up at the stars by the fire.  i notice a "star" blink bright then disappeared.  catching my attention, i focused my eyes on the spot i saw it.  about 5-10 sec later the object blinked bright then off, but in a different spot.

amazed, i called to my friends to look up at it, wait and watch.  they too witness the object blink bright then off in different spots as if it was traveling.  the blinking delay was about 5-10 sec each time with no constant light like on an aircraft.  

i first thought it might have been the iss, because about 30 mins or so prior, we spotted a "satellite".  but the slow blinking and change in direction meant it was something else.

after further research i believe it was in the area on the constellation of hercules.  the object travel from what i believe is the "left most" shoulder of hercules to the right...In a span of about 3-4 blinks.  then changed direction toward the "knee" of hercules  in a span of about 3 blinks.  then the object changed direction again, moving right towards the "bow" of hercules for about 3-4 blinks.

the brightest during the blink on was roughly 120% the brightness of the stars in hercules.  as the object moved towards hercules's bow, the intensity faded to nothing in about 2-3 blinks.  i believe it sped away fast

the altitude seemed to be that of a commercial satellite.

the feeling was excitment of spotting and watching it change direction.  that alone tells me its not normal.  as such, i'm convinced it was indeed a ufo.
content.summary: Star-like blinking object, changed direction, then faded

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch when i looked up into the south west sky and saw this bright light. so i held my phone up and snapped a couple pictures and then it zipped across the sky in a straight line about 600 ft to the south east.  i tried to get my phone in place to get another picture when it took off what appeared to be straight up. and i never remembered a thing about it until this march when i was going through my camera photos looking for a spacific photo and  bam there they were. both pictures side by side and bits and pieces of that evening started to come back. i dont remember seeing much more than what my camera took. but there seemed to be a bluish haze with the object i figured it to be about 40 to 50 ft in with rather oval shaped with another half oval, about half as wide as the craft on the top. but like i said, i lost track of the whole experience until i seen these pictures nearly  a year later. here are the two pictures i was able to get.  and i have had  two other sitings since then, and i wander if they may be conected.
content.summary: I was on the front porch and seen it and snapped a couple pictures before it left

content.detailedDescription: Observed two lights that looked like stars until one of them started moving.  movement was strange.  one object moved to the west, then back to its original location and then to the east. but rather than move directly east, crossing the path of the other object, it first moved to the south as if to avoid the other object, then moved east
content.summary: Two star like objects moving and changing directions

content.detailedDescription: On may 9, 2015 at appx. 8:00am i went to my sliding doors facing our  backyard and opened the blinds and drapes to look out at the stormy weather. it was raining and the skies were covered with gray clouds.  i looked towards the southeast and saw a huge sun like yellow-orange object which i thought was the sun at first. it was too low for the sun, and also didn't bother my eyes to look at it. i continued to look at it for appx. 3 or 4 minutes then i looked away for a second, turned back and it was gone. i wondered how the sun was shining through the rainy clouds like that, and why it was so large and more of a sun setting color at that time of morning. then i realized the sun would not be in that position in the sky at the time i saw it. i know this because i am up early in the mornings and keep track of the sun to see where it is to know if i should open or close the drapes to keep the house cooler or warmer on hot or cold days. i made it a point to look outside the sliding door at the same time this morning (next morning) to see where the sun was positioned. the sun was no where near the position i saw the orb. the sun was a white yellow and extremely bright and i couldn't look at it but a second. i am 100% positive i saw an orb and not the sun. what this orb was, i cannot say. i wish i knew because i've been made fun of seeing these. i say these because i have witnessed another just shy of two years ago. for one that has seen these, we take on a more serious view as to what these are. the one i saw 2 years ago was appx. half the size of this one and glided right over myself and a neighbor. it was a red/orange orb. it was fairly low to the ground and had no openings. i studied it as it glided over as if it were gliding on ice. it had no sound, nor openings, i did see swirls like in the color. it just traveled till out of site going from east to west.
content.summary: May 9, 2015 appx. 8:00 am witnessed a yellow orange orb size of a setting sun in the distance in olive branch, mississippi area

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on the outdoor patio on saturday night, may 2nd apprx. 9 pm.
i noticed a glowing blue light streak upwards very fast, then turn a bit and streak first east, then back west. it caught my attention because it moved very quickly. it disappeared around horizon line, then i ran to get my cell phone to record it and it was gone. a minute later, it came back again. this time, it came up and hovered for at least 2-3 minutes in the same spot, then moved slightly left, then very slowly, it started sinking to the horizon, then completely disappeared! when i say disappeared, i mean it was a if someone had shut the lights off.  it was a royal/cobalt blue color, with flashes of white light. at first we thought someone was launching a drone, but when we watched the video and saw the speed, and the intense color, we knew it had to be something else.
i called a hobby shop in my area that sells drones to ask if anyone knew anyone flying them at that hour.  the sales guy seemed surprised and asked what i had seen.  i said to him, please don't think i am a nut, and i told him the story.  he said that he had seen the exact light on thanksgiving 2014, and told his girlfriend and parents, and no one believed him. i went to the store and showed him the video i had and he was so thankful that someone else had seen it too and also recorded it.
i hope you will be able to analyze my video. on my home computer, it comes out pretty clear, but when i email it or text it, it is very faint and hard to see. i uploaded it to you tube, and you can see it a bit better.
content.summary: Witnessed blue orb traveling at high rate of speed and then hovering
